title: Scores of the Original Music Tracks from League of Legends
body:
Hi everybody!! How are you!!

I have searched for any topic with any information about this, but I didn't found, so here is my question:

Could Riot put the scores of the music tracks that they have put for us on free?

I'm studying music and there are so many themes I would like to cover with my band, but I only could cover Lightbringer - Pentakill because there were no more scores from the album (Smite & Ignite).

Here is my request. I would love Riot could do that, but I can imagine there must be some legal therms from the composers, but I had to try.

Thank you for your attention and sorry if my english is not good enough, it's not my language :S.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Thanks for your interest in discovering more of our sheet music. 

At this point, the only thing we can say is that we are actively working on releasing more sheet music to our players. We’re still working on format, content, release date, etc. 

When we’re ready, rest assured we’ll let you all know on these forums! 

The Riot Music Team
